snippet.title: Monstrous Lovers Trailer
snippet.description:
Monstrous Lovers  is a visual novel about dating supernatural creatures! Play as Christopher, a young and idealistic office worker whose job takes him to a town full of monsters.

 💜 160,000+ words of intrigue and romance
 💜 4 routes
💜 free R18 patch

👉 Get it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1596820/Monstrous_Lovers/
👉 Or on itchio: https://maneatergames.itch.io/monstrouslovers
